name: A Kitchen Nightmare
description:
A tabletop game for a GM and 3-4 players, designed to be played in 1-3 hours.

Your restaurant is on the brink of closing. In a last-ditch attempt to save the business, you applied to the show Kitchen Nightmares and were accepted. The film crew is on their way, Gordon Ramsay’s eloquent advice is on the horizon and your last chance is about to begin. The only issue? You and all your staff are gangsters, using this business as a front for your criminal activity. Can you get away with your crimes and save your restaurant, or will everything collapse? Hint: it’s gonna be the latter.
